Items.Title: Resolution supporting President Barack Obama’s nomination of Judge Sonia Sotomayor to the Supreme Court of the United States, congratulating Judge Sotomayor on her nomination, and urging swift Senate confirmation.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Urging President Obama to appoint Sonia Sotomayor, a judge on the U.S. Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit, to the Supreme Court of the United States.

Items.Title: Resolution supporting President Barack Obama’s nomination of Judge Sonia Sotomayor to the Supreme Court of the United States, congratulating Judge Sotomayor on her nomination, and urging swift Senate confirmation.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Urging President Obama to appoint Sonia Sotomayor, a judge on the U.S. Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit, to the Supreme Court of the United States.

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Mark-Viverito, Crowley, Reyna, Gennaro, Brewer, Koppell, Jackson, Yassky, Fidler and Sears
